name: SincereMen
detailed_description:
Gameplay


The game consist of 4 parts:

  • Chopper Shooting
  • Vehicles Pursuit
  • Abandon village
  • Hidden Lab

Every part has its own unique gameplay.

Shoot the enemies with heavy machine gun on a flying chopper
Destroy the enemies armored vehicle with heavy and light machineguns , Rocket launcher and etc...
Use mortar to destroy enemy bases and artillery.
Use the different equipments the player have.

Gameplay Supplements

  • Gun expert : Using different Weapons with different accessory
  • Giving order to his partner : Mark your enemies, your friend will take care of them.
  • Stealth mode and action mode : decide how to proceed stealth or fire

short_description: This game is a First Person Shooter video game based on VR technology with realistic graphic and hardcore action shooter gameplay. The main character is a trained ranger that come to help his partner from the edge of the chopper using a heavy machinegun and try to save him.
